transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello. Haan bolo. Haan ji very good afternoon sir Priyanka baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se. Sir 9th of November ko aap
Customer: Sir main aapse wahi aapke services ko lekar discuss kar rahi hu sir ki aapko
Customer: Kal bataya to hai aapko complaint.
Executive: Kya bataya hai sir bataye please. Mam by leads dikh rahi hai wo retail hai aur kitna samjhau aapko.
Executive: Sir lekin aap mostly leads ka consumption kar rahe hain wo aap bulk leads ka hi consumption kar rahe hain.
Customer: Usi ka to retail ho raha hai usi ka to wohi 100 kilo likha hua phone karte karte 100 gram chahiye.
Executive: Sir sari leads to matlab sir total agar main baat karu
Customer: Maximum wohi hai na mam 2% chances hi hai positive ke 2%. 2% to aadmi zinda rehne ke bhi rate nahi hai usse bhi jyada rehte hain.
Executive: Sir wo baat to aapki samajh gayi lekin aapka main dekh rahi thi 5 November ko bhi aapne 3:30 se 4 lakh ka lead uthaya 8 ko bhi aapne
Customer: Are mam positive uske baad me ek bhi mere ko shauk nahi hai aapka phone aane ka mere paas waise bhi time nahi hai.
Executive: But sir aapke number pe
Customer: Time nahi hai aapse muh lagne ka lekin kare kya mam. Nahi positive response nahi hai main bol bol ke thak gaya hu aapko ab aur kya bolu.
Executive: Sir sir agar aap discuss nahi karenge to hum solution aapko kaise denge bina baat kiye
Customer: Kya discuss aap aap faltu ka wohi copy paste copy paste copy paste kar rahe ho aap aap meri baatein kar rahe ho. Solution nahi mil raha hai solution kahan hai.
Executive: Sir aapko jarurat hai aap bhi wohi copy paste kar rahe hain sir aapko jarurat hai aap bhi wohi copy paste kar rahe hain sir.
Customer: Mere ko problem hai na mam main to bhugat raha hu.
Executive: Sir aapko problem hai aap keh rahe ho but yahan par agar main aapka review dekhu aapka calls dekhu jisme aap client ko reply kar rahe ho calls answer kar rahe ho wo to properly positive hai.
Customer: Meri baat suno aap password le lo OTP lagao login karo us customer se baatein karo jitne bhi customer se kiya aapko vishwas nahi main deta hu na authority main leke deta hu letter head pe ki Priyanka mam aap check kar lo ek ek customer ko call karo agar wo jo likha hua hai wo accept kar leta hai na to bhi bahut hai bas mere liye.
Executive: Sir main wo nahi keh rahi hu
Customer: 100 kg likha hai 100 kg bas 10 me se aath client aise hai 2% 10 me se nahi sorry 100 me se do client positive hai mam ab 2% nikalna hamare liye bahut mushkil hai bas baat itni si hai ab aap samjho to theek hai warna koi baat nahi.
Executive: Sir actually
Customer: Hum to ye genuine reply to ye hai aapka feedback humne de diya manna ho to theek hai warna hamare ko koi interest nahi hai thank you so much.
Executive: Sir aapne feedback diya
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer complained about retail buyleads instead of bulk.

- Expressed frustration with lack of positive responses.

- Stated he is tired of repeating the issue.



Resolution:

- Executive stated customer's replies are positive.

- Customer offered access to check customer interactions.

- Customer provided feedback and ended the call.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, retail, positive response, feedback
